item.title: Video Content Creator for Local Jewelry Company (Salt Lake City / Park City) - Upwork
item.description:
Description:
We're a jewelry company based in Park City seeking a skilled video content creator to produce video content to be used in ads and organic social media.

Responsibilities:

Develop and produce engaging video content, from concept to final edit.
Collaborate with our marketing team on video concepts and scripts.
Shoot and edit videos.
Ensure timely delivery of high-quality videos that meet our brand standards.

Requirements:

Proven experience in video production.
Proficiency in video editing tools.
Strong portfolio demonstrating previous video work.
Must be based locally in Salt Lake City / Park City for on-site shooting.

Duration: Freelance, potential for ongoing collaboration based on performance.


Posted On: June 21, 2024 20:04 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Production, TikTok, Video Editing, Video Ad
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Production, TikTok, Video Editing, Video Ad
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: HP Product Unboxing/Demo Video - New York, NY - Upwork
item.description:
Read in Full with product page linked below
HP OmniBook Unboxing and Demo Video
Final Deliverable: 4K 3min video (+/-) to highlight key features and experiences of the PC
Equipment Required: (2) 4K Cameras, Tri-pods for locked footage, gimbal/stabilizer, lavalier mic, LED Lighting kit
Environment: Office environment, Outdoor location tbd (for mobility story)
- Potential existing footage to be included
Post production: add in-screen demo videos and VO to show experiences
Product Page - https://www.hp.com/us-en/laptops-and-2-in-1s/omnibook-x-ai-pc.html

"HP OmniBook X AI PCs are designed to focus on the big things and let the small things take care of themselves. Power your personal productivity with AI that learns from you and adapts to you. Now you can have the perfect mix of powerful performance and mobility to seamlessly adapt to your work style, and the best collaboration tools designed to enhance personal connections and communicate more effectively with others. Unlock more meaningful moments with HP’s AI-powered PCs"


Posted On: June 21, 2024 19:47 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:How To, Documentary, Demo Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Lighting
Skills: How To, Documentary, Demo Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Lighting
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
